Item ID1729

The amulet of defence is created when an emerald amulet has been enchanted using the Lvl-2 Enchant spell. It is not widely used, as it only gives defence bonuses. However, it can prove useful in situations where more damage is going to be taken than dealt, such as skilling in the Wilderness or activities like Pyramid Plunder.

Amulets of defence can be sold to Davon's Amulet Store in Brimhaven, starting at 956 coins each if none are in stock. The amulet of defence (t), a cosmetic variant, can be obtained as a rare reward from beginner clue scrolls.

[[File:Amulet of defence detail.png|left|140px]]
The '''amulet of defence''' is created when an [[emerald amulet]] has been enchanted using the [[Lvl-2 Enchant]] spell. It is not widely used, as it only gives defence bonuses. However, it can prove useful in situations where more damage is going to be taken than dealt, such as skilling in the [[Wilderness]] or activities like [[Pyramid Plunder]]. 

Amulets of defence can be sold to [[Davon's Amulet Store]] in [[Brimhaven]], starting at 956 coins each if none are in stock. The [[amulet of defence (t)]], a cosmetic variant, can be obtained as a rare reward from [[beginner clue scroll]]s.
